summary: VOLKSWAGEN OF AMERICA WILL NOT RECALL FAULTY COIL PACKS IN 2001/2002/2003 PASSAT 1.8TS, EVEN THOUGH THEY KNOW THE INSTALLED PART IS DEFECTIVE.   MY FIRST COIL PACK FAILED, AND WILL BE REPLACED UNDER WARRANTY BUT VW WILL NOT REPLACE ALL COIL PACKS, AS THEY SHOULD.  THIS IS A DANGEROUS SITUATION, AS COIL PACK FAILURE WHILE ON THE ROAD MAY CAUSE ACCIDENTS.   *JB
